query:
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.slug, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products p WHERE p.categoryId = c.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
WHERE c.slug = 'falafel' OR c.name = 'Falafel';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 22Rpum9L9sZxinw.3c3b08241dc8 --database co5PUNqXK8tudZyuUEyQHS --execute SELECT c.id, c.name, c.slug, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products p WHERE p.categoryId = c.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
WHERE c.slug = 'falafel' OR c.name = 'Falafel';
